privacy.locationEncryptionNotice: Your location will be encrypted using asymmetric cryptography (X25519 + ChaCha20-Poly1305) before being sent to the server. Only authorized processes in the TEE can decrypt this data.
privacy.heatmapPrivacyDescription: This heatmap shows areas of activity without revealing individual GPS data. All analytics are computed within the TEE.

testAPI.title: Serverless API Testing
testAPI.selectEndpoint: Select an API endpoint to test
testAPI.noResponse: No response yet. Submit the form to see results.

zkVerification.title: Zero-Knowledge Verification
zkVerification.failure: Verification failed: The proof could not be verified.

zkErrors.unwrap_throw: Circuit constraint not satisfied. The proof cannot be generated with the given inputs.
zkErrors.typeError: Type error. The input values might be in an incorrect format.
zkErrors.loadCircuit: Failed to load the circuit. The circuit file might be missing or corrupted.
zkErrors.initBackend: Failed to initialize the ZK backend.
zkErrors.locationHash: Location hash cannot be zero. Please use valid location coordinates.
zkErrors.reputation: Score must be greater than or equal to the threshold for a valid reputation proof.
zkErrors.tokenBalance: Token balance cannot be zero for a valid ownership proof.
zkErrors.commitment: Commitment hash cannot be zero. Please provide a non-empty task description.
zkErrors.jwt: JWT token cannot be empty for a valid Explorer Badge proof.
zkErrors.visitTime: Visit time must be within the last 24 hours.
zkErrors.deadline: Deadline must be in the future.
zkErrors.requiredVisits: Required visits must be greater than zero.
zkErrors.invalidScore: Score must be a positive number.
zkErrors.invalidThreshold: Threshold must be a positive number.
zkErrors.invalidMinimum: Minimum required value must be a positive number.

zkVerification.proof_of_visitDescription: Prove you visited a specific location without revealing your exact coordinates. The proof only confirms your presence at a location within a specific time window.
zkVerification.reputationDescription: Prove your reputation score is above a threshold without revealing your exact score. This can be used for access control to exclusive areas.
zkVerification.ownershipDescription: Prove you own a certain number of tokens without revealing your exact balance. This can be used to verify eligibility for token-gated experiences.
zkVerification.commitmentDescription: Create trustless commitments to complete tasks by a deadline. The commitment is cryptographically secured without requiring a trusted third party.
zkVerification.explorerBadgeDescription: Prove you've visited enough locations to earn the Explorer Badge without revealing which specific locations you've visited.
zkVerification.invalidCoordinates: Please enter valid latitude and longitude coordinates.
zkVerification.invalidTimestamp: Please enter a valid timestamp value.
zkVerification.invalidDeadline: Please enter a valid deadline timestamp.
zkVerification.invalidRequiredVisits: Please enter a valid number for required visits.

locationModal.title: Location Selection
locationModal.prompt: Please select the map location you want to use:

mapMenu.clickMapToAdd: Click on the map to add a spot
mapMenu.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
mapMenu.rewardsExplanation: Discover rewards near your private spots on the map. The more spots you add, the more rewards you can find!
mapMenu.rewardDescription: You've discovered a reward near one of your private spots. Collect it or explore more to find others.
mapMenu.checkNearbyRewards: Hover over the map to see rewards
mapMenu.title: Map Menu

badges.title: Badges & Rewards
badges.exploreMore: Explore more locations! You need at least {{required}}% exploration to earn a badge
badges.badgeDescription: This badge recognizes your exploration achievements
badges.poapDescription: Proof of Attendance Protocol token for active explorers

zkLocationProof.zkExplainer: This proof verifies your visit without revealing your exact location data or timestamps to anyone

analytics.title: Location Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Privacy-Preserved TEE Analytics
analytics.visitsDescription: All analytics are computed in the Trusted Execution Environment, protecting individual location data.
analytics.privacyGuarantee: Your privacy is guaranteed through TEE technology
analytics.aggregatedData: Data shown is aggregated and anonymized
analytics.noDataAvailable: No analytics data available for this location

mapChat.title: Travel Assistant
mapChat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I can help you find interesting places to visit or eat around you. What would you like to know?
mapChat.inputPlaceholder: Ask about places to visit or eat...
mapChat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error while processing your request. Please try again.
mapChat.routeShortcut: Suggest a perfect day trip itinerary
mapChat.eventsShortcut: Are there any events happening now?
mapChat.hiddenGemsShortcut: Show me hidden gems around here
